column2: liThe turnover tax in  respect of any quarter shall  be  paid  not later than the

column1: fifteenth day of the  month following the end  of that quarter. Any tax  not

column2: so  paid shall  be  deemed to be  in default and  the person by whom such tax
is  payable  or where  any  tax  is  payable  by  more than  one  person,  or by  a
partnership  shall  be  deemed  to  be  a  defaulter  for  the  purposes  of this
